actor_awards.notes: Born Byron Barr, he adopted the name 'Gig Young' after playing a character by that name in the 1942 film 'The Gay Sisters'.(1969).

filmography.title: They Shoot Horses, Don't They?
filmography.role_description: The cynical and manipulative master of ceremonies of a grueling dance marathon during the Great Depression.
filmography.plot: The lives of a disparate group of contestants intersect during a grueling dance marathon in the middle of the Great Depression.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Win – Best Supporting Actor; Golden Globe: Win – Best Supporting Actor

filmography.title: Come Fill the Cup
filmography.role_description: The wealthy, alcoholic nephew of a newspaper publisher, whose life intersects with a recovering alcoholic editor.
filmography.plot: A recovering alcoholic reporter tries to help a young man who has fallen into the same trap.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor; Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor

filmography.title: Teacher's Pet
filmography.role_description: A charming and intellectual psychology professor who becomes a rival for the affections of a journalism teacher.
filmography.plot: A hard-nosed newspaper editor poses as a student in a journalism night class to get close to the instructor.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor; Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Supporting Actor

filmography.title: The Gay Sisters
filmography.role_description: An artist character whose name the actor subsequently adopted as his professional stage name.
filmography.plot: Three sisters fight to hold onto their family mansion and legacy amidst legal battles and personal turmoil.

filmography.title: Young at Heart
filmography.role_description: A successful and affable songwriter whose arrival disrupts the lives of a musical family.
filmography.plot: A cynical songwriter enters the lives of a musical family and changes the dynamics between three sisters.

filmography.title: Desk Set
filmography.role_description: An ambitious and somewhat neglectful executive who is the long-term boyfriend of the head librarian.
filmography.plot: A computer expert tries to prove that his electronic brain can replace the reference department of a television network.

filmography.title: That Touch of Mink
filmography.role_description: A neurotic financial advisor who tries to help his wealthy friend navigate a romantic predicament.
filmography.plot: A wealthy businessman courts a working-class woman with a proposal that doesn't include marriage.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Win – Best Motion Picture - Comedy

filmography.title: The Three Musketeers
filmography.role_description: The strong and jovial musketeer who fights alongside D'Artagnan in this Technicolor adaptation.
filmography.plot: D'Artagnan and his musketeer friends fight to protect the King and Queen of France from the schemes of Cardinal Richelieu.

filmography.title: The Desperate Hours
filmography.role_description: The boyfriend of the daughter in a family held hostage by escaped convicts.
filmography.plot: Three escaped convicts take a suburban family hostage in their own home.

filmography.title: Kid Galahad
filmography.role_description: A boxing promoter who discovers a talented young fighter but has ulterior motives.
filmography.plot: A boxing promoter takes a young mechanic under his wing, training him to become a prizefighter.

filmography.title: Game of Death
filmography.role_description: A journalist friend of the martial arts star who helps him fake his death.
filmography.plot: A martial arts star fakes his death to find the people who are trying to kill him.

filmography.title: Wake of the Red Witch
filmography.role_description: The first mate on a ship captained by a man seeking revenge and sunken treasure.
filmography.plot: A ship captain battles a shipping magnate for a fortune in gold and the love of a woman in the South Seas.

filmography.title: City That Never Sleeps
filmography.role_description: A Chicago police officer who plans to leave the force and run away with a nightclub dancer.
filmography.plot: A dissatisfied cop decides to leave his job and wife, but gets pulled into a complex night of crime.

filmography.title: Strange Bedfellows
filmography.role_description: A public relations man who tries to fix the image of a corporate executive.
filmography.plot: An American executive in London tries to reconcile with his fiery Italian wife to secure a promotion.

filmography.title: Ask Any Girl
filmography.role_description: The brother of a smooth operator who becomes the object of a young woman's marketing research.
filmography.plot: A young woman comes to New York and uses market research techniques to catch a husband.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actress (Shirley MacLaine)

filmography.title: The Tunnel of Love
filmography.role_description: A neighbor whose own lifestyle contrasts with the adoption struggles of the main couple.
filmography.plot: A suburban couple goes through a series of comedic trials and errors while trying to adopt a baby.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actor (Richard Widmark)

filmography.title: Air Force
filmography.role_description: The co-pilot of the 'Mary-Ann', a B-17 bomber caught in the attack on Pearl Harbor.
filmography.plot: The crew of a B-17 bomber arrives in Hawaii just as the Japanese attack Pearl Harbor and is sent into action.

filmography.title: Old Acquaintance
filmography.role_description: A younger man who becomes romantically involved with one of the feuding female writers.
filmography.plot: Two female authors, friends since childhood, navigate their careers and complex personal lives over two decades.

filmography.title: The Hindenburg
filmography.role_description: An American advertising executive traveling on the ill-fated airship.
filmography.plot: A film that speculates on a sabotage plot that causes the Hindenburg disaster in 1937.

filmography.title: Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia
filmography.role_description: A hitman hired to find a man who impregnated the daughter of a powerful Mexican patron.
filmography.plot: An American barroom pianist and his prostitute girlfriend go on a road trip through the Mexican underworld to collect a bounty.

filmography.title: The Killer Elite
filmography.role_description: A CIA operative who hires a private security team to protect an Asian client.
filmography.plot: A private security agent is betrayed by his partner and seeks revenge while protecting a diplomat.

filmography.title: Lovers and Other Strangers
filmography.role_description: The father of the bride in this ensemble comedy about a wedding.
filmography.plot: The story of a wedding and the various romantic complications of the families involved.

filmography.title: The Story on Page One
filmography.role_description: A man accused of conspiring with his lover to murder her abusive husband.
filmography.plot: A woman and her lover are put on trial for the murder of her husband, with a dedicated lawyer defending them.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Actress (Rita Hayworth)

filmography.title: Five Miles to Midnight
filmography.role_description: A journalist who becomes involved in the violent marital dispute of an American couple in Paris.
filmography.plot: A woman is terrorized by her husband, who is supposed to be dead, in this suspense thriller.

filmography.title: Torch Song
filmography.role_description: A blind pianist who softens the heart of a tough Broadway star.
filmography.plot: A demanding Broadway star finds love with a blind pianist who is not intimidated by her.

filmography.title: Lust for Gold
filmography.role_description: A scheming husband searching for the legendary Lost Dutchman's Mine.
filmography.plot: A man searches for a lost gold mine in Arizona, uncovering a history of greed and murder.

filmography.title: Only the Valiant
filmography.role_description: A cavalry lieutenant who is sent on a dangerous mission to hold a pass against Apaches.
filmography.plot: A cavalry captain is blamed for the death of a popular lieutenant and must lead a suicide mission to hold off Apache attacks.
